item.text: Welcome to this [[Federated Wiki]] site. From this page you can find who we are and what we do. New sites provide this information and then claim the site as their own. You will need your own site to participate.

item.prompt:
Link to a page about yourself here. Type your name enclosed in double square brackets. Then press Command/ALT-S to save.

Make all pages here yours alone with the login below.

item.text: Pages where we do and share.

item.prompt: Create pages about things you do on this wiki. Type a descriptive name of something you will be writing about. Enclose it in square brackets. Then press Command/ALT-S to save.

item.text: You can edit your copy of these pages. Press [+] to add more writing spaces. Read [[How to Wiki]] for more ideas. Follow [[Recent Changes]] here and nearby.
Welcome to this [[Federated Wiki]] site about interaction design. See [[Recent Changes]] to see what we are [[Currently Working On]].

item.prompt:
Link to a page about yourself here. Type your name enclosed in double square brackets. Then press Command/ALT-S to save.

Make all pages here yours alone with the login below.
item.text: The Viral Academy is an open distributed education project for offline and online group work. Our aim is to make online learning more social, personalised, and flexible - [http://viral.academy viral.academy]
item.title: Viral Academy

item.text: Welcome to this [[Federated Wiki]] site about [[Interaction Design]]. See [[Recent Changes]] to see what we are [[Currently Working On]].

item.prompt: Create pages about things you do on this wiki. Type a descriptive name of something you will be writing about. Enclose it in square brackets. Then press Command/ALT-S to save.
item.text: Interaction design (often abbreviated [[IxD]]), is the practice of designing interactive digital products, environments, systems, and services.
item.title: Interaction Design

item.text: In this course we look at how to design interfaces for digital products, with a particular focus on mobile devices.
item.title: IXD Academy

item.text: A list of sites that document technology related to the [[Smallest Federated Wiki]]
